title: The 'Smallest House in Italy' is NWO Approved
cleaned_text: We all know the Agenda 21 plan for America and across the world is to move all of us to designated resident areas where they can stack us efficiently in these micro-houses to fit more people in one area. Since the world population is only increasing and space is decreasing; the only option is to effectively reduce the world’s population to a controllable number and these micro-apartments are only another tool of the trade. Much like vaccines, chemtrails, GMOs, etc.. This house is only 75 square feet. Would you want to live in this small place?
